newsitem.title: JAPAN: All months of Tokyo corn futures end higher.
newsitem.headline: All months of Tokyo corn futures end higher.

text.p: All months of Tokyo corn futures closed higher on Monday, mainly because of the yen's weaker mood against the dollar, local traders said.
Prices were 20 to 120 yen higher, with the benchmark September up 110 yen at 18,260. Daily volume was 35,534 lots.

Distant months gained from the opening on light buying from local investors, they said. "Nearby months had technical selling in early morning. But the weaker yen against the dollar encouraged investors to buy in the afternoon," a brokerage house trader said.
